metadata.description:
020200 and [in]anace share music making via the internet since 1999. 'from crop to merge' shows the process how work of them changed. in the beginning they shared .flp files and took individual elements from each other to put 'em together to a collage of a single new track. you can listen at 'jellybean remix'.
After developing own music styles and electronic treatments, the merging aspect was rising. the sound weren't cropped anymore, but merged- like merging trans-parent graphic layers. You can listen at 'dotons' and 'merge'.
metadata.title: 020200 and [in]anace - fron crop to merge ep [63_042]
metadata.subject: scape
